headers.subject: [tosdr:2607] Flattr allows third-party cookies

html:
Some of our business partners, like any advertisers, may use cookies on the Flattr Site. We have no access to, or control over, these cookies.

http://flattr.com/privacy

Title: Flattr allows third-party cookies

Topic: third-party

Summary: Flattr allows their advertisers to use cookies on the Flattr site. This allows these third parties to track you and collect information on your browsing habits.

Score: 80 (mediocre) 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
